definition: the course of one's life/one's fate
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc
to meet with many difficulties in one's life (idiom)
to have a tough life/to meet much adversity in one's life

sentences.english: She defends her dignity bravely. She has a good fortune and happy marriage. Her destiny is the best of all her sisters.
sentences.chinese: 她命途順達，婚姻幸福，是姐妹中命運結局最理想的。

sentences.english: MingTu were far worse a finally party.
sentences.chinese: 命途多舛的一家終於聚會。

sentences.english: Xiao Hong was full of setbacks and frustrations in her life, suffering from all kinds of tribulation. She died in Hong Kong for illness only at 31 years old.
sentences.chinese: 蕭紅一生命途多舛，受盡磨難，31歲就在香港病故。

definition: bumpy (of a road)/rough (of life)/to be down on one's luck/to be full of frustrations and dashed hopes
to be born under an unlucky star (usu. of women)/to be born unlucky
luck/fate/opportunity/the ups and downs of life
affairs of life/things of the world
to meet with many difficulties in one's life (idiom)
to have a tough life/to meet much adversity in one's life
